text: Diplotaxis hirta is a species of flowering plants of the family Brassicaceae. The species is endemic to Cape Verde.Oromí, Martín, Zurita & Cabrera, 2005 : Lista preliminar de especies silvestres de Cabo Verde: Hongos, Plantas y Animales Terrestres. Gobierno de Canarias, Consejería de Medio Ambiente y Ordenación Territorial, p. 42 It is listed as an endangered plant by the IUCN. ==Distribution and ecology== Diplotaxis hirta is restricted to mountain areas of the island of Fogo, between 800 and 2,000 metres elevation. ==References== hirta Category:Endemic flora of Cape Verde Category:Flora of Fogo, Cape Verde
title: Diplotaxis hirta
